src:
Hofenhajmu dosta 25 minuta, Paderborn ne pušta “fenjer“
01 Nov 2019, 22:28 by Darko
Hofenhajm – Paderborn 3:0 (3:0)Skov 2′, Kaderabek 15′, Lokadija 25′
U prvoj utakmici 10. kola Bundeslige Hofenhajm je ostvario očekivanu pobedu protiv slabog Paderborna.
Mnogo lakše od očekivanja domaćin je upisao nove bodove i vezao četvrtu uzastopnu pobedu u Bundesligi, a petu računajući i Kup. Sve je bilo rešeno za samo 25 minuta. Prvo je Robert Skov postigao prelep gol iz slobodnog udarca već u 2. minutu. Bivši as Kopenhagena i danski reprezentativac, dao je jedan od lepših golova u ovoj sezoni. Več u 15. minutu, nakon odlične akcije navalnog reda, Kardabek je duplirao prednost, da bi Lokadija u 25. postigao treći i, ispostavilo se, poslednji gol na meču.
Domaćin nije mnogo zapinjao u nastavku, a gosti su bili nemoćni da urade nešto više. Hohenhajm je skočio na 5. mesto sa 17 bodova, dok je Paderborn ostao na samo 4 osvojena boda.
Subota, 02.11.15.30 Leverkuzen – Menhengladbah15.30 Dortmund – Volfsburg15.30 Ajntraht – Bajern15.30 Lajpcig – Majnc15.30 Verder – Frajburg18.30 Union Berlin – Herta
Nedelja, 03.11.15.30 Fortuna – Keln18.00 Augzburg – Šalke

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Hofenheim takes 25 minutes, Paderborn does not release a lantern
01 Nov 2019, 21:28 by Darko
Hoffenheim - Paderborn 3-0 (3-0) Skov 2 ′, Kaderabek 15 ′, Lokadia 25 ′
In the first game of the 10th round of the Bundesliga, Hoffenheim achieved the expected victory against weak Paderborn.
Much easier than expected, the host registered new points and tied for the fourth consecutive Bundesliga victory and the fifth counting for the Cup. Everything was solved in just 25 minutes. First Robert Skov scored a beautiful free kick in the 2nd minute. The former Copenhagen ace and Danish national team has given up one of the nicer goals this season. Already in the 15th minute, after an excellent action of the naval order, Kardabek doubled the advantage, to Lokadi in the 25th scored the third and, it turned out, the last goal of the match.
The host did not get much stuck in the sequel and the guests were powerless to do anything more. Hohenheim jumped to 5th place with 17 points, while Paderborn remained only 4 points clear.
Saturday, 02.11.15.30 Leverkusen - Mönchengladbach15.30 Dortmund - Wolfsburg15.30 Eintracht - Bayern15.30 Leipzig - Mainz15.30 Werder Bremen - Freiburg18.30 Union Berlin - Hertha
Sunday, 11/03/1530 Fortuna - Cologne18.00 Augsburg - Schalke
